item.description: What was once built on community and personal connection has become formal and institutionalized.

item.title: The Rise Of AI Video-Driven Retail: How Latin America Is Quietly Reinventing Retail
item.description: The next revolution in retail might emerge from short 15-second videos that will be produced in Bogotá and Buenos Aires and Belo Horizonte.

item.title: Avoiding Legal Traps: How To Use Agentic AI In Healthcare
item.description: We have entered the era where AI agents are making clinical decisions, automating claim denials and recommending care timelines.
